duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead contract negotiations with suppliers and leverage data analytics to ensure fiscal expectations are met or exceeded.
Drive strategy and prioritization of negotiations, with a focus on supplier value and incremental dollars.
Strengthen key relationships and drive accountability for supplier KPI performance, including contract compliance and issue resolution.
Lead continuous sourcing improvements and support cross-functional operational enhancements.
Provide mentorship and guidance to less experienced colleagues in the field of strategic sourcing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business preferred or equivalent work experience
